mapper.select: SELECT * FROM funding WHERE reg_stts = 'e1' ORDER BY 1

SELECT b.* FROM (SELECT rownum rn , a.* FROM (SELECT * FROM funding JOIN (SELECT fnd_no, TRUNC(fnd_end_date - sysdate) as dday FROM funding) USING (fnd_no) WHERE reg_stts = 'e1' order by 1 desc) a WHERE rownum <= #{page} * 9) b WHERE b.rn > (#{page}-1) * 9
